name: Race to the End
description:
Boost through obstacles, avoid death, and get the best time! 

Bonus Objective: Collect every coin.

Recommend Xbox Controller:

  • Left Thumb-stick: Move
  • A: Boost
  • Start: Pause

PC Controls: 

  • WASD: Move
  • Left Shift: Boost
  • ESC: Pause

Started Development: 9/28/2019

Next Update: 10/6/2019
